name: Lost City of Vampires
description: Sent by the Council to hunt the "lost city" factions... You must destroy an entire bloodline and put an end to an unsanctioned blood war by remaining the last vampire standing in this single player shooter challenge.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Quad-Core or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 or AMD Radeon HD 4770 or better (1GB VRAM) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 14 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
